title.en: Gal to Iinchou ga Guuzen Saikai suru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: ギャルと委員長が偶然再会する話

altTitles.ja-ro: Gyaru to Iinchou ga Guuzen Saikai suru Hanashi

altTitles.en: A Story about a Gal and a Committee Chairwoman Who Meet Again by Coincidence

altTitles.pt-br: A história de uma gal e uma presidente de comitê que se reencontram por acaso

altTitles.es: Una historia sobre una gal y una presidenta de comité que se reencuentran por coincidencia

description.en: After finishing her errands, Marina heads for the bus stop on her way home. However, there she runs into the drunken former committee chairwoman from her high school days. She thinks she doesn't remember her, but while she's taking care of her, she says to her, "You used to avoid me...," which is very meaningful to her...?

title.en: I Thought She Was a Yandere, but Apparently She's Even Worse

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレかと思ったらもっとヤベー女だった

altTitles.id: Ku kira dia yandere tapi ternyata lebih parah

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレかと思ったらラブコメっぽくなる彼女

altTitles.ja-ro: Yandere Ka To Omottara Motto Yabe Onna Datta

altTitles.es-la: Pensé que era una yandere, pero resultó ser una chica mucho más peligrosa.

altTitles.tr: Onun Yandere Olduğunu Sanıyordum Ama Durum Daha Betermiş

description.en:
A man who no longer can turn a blind eye saves a girl who's being bullied by the other classmate, but little did he know.

---

**Notes:**
- There is also a fan colored version and an R18 side(?) story:
description.id: Seorang pria yang tidak lagi bisa menutup mata menyelamatkan seorang gadis yang di-bully oleh teman sekelasnya,tapi sedikit yang dia tahu.
description.tr: Artık sınıf arkadaşının zorbalanmasına göz yumamayan çocuk sınıf arkadaşını kurtarır, oysa...
description.es-la: Psicópata se enamora de un chico normal.

altTitles.ja: 山田家の女

description.en: Her grandmother divorced thrice, her mother divorced twice, and her sister is a single mother. Yamada Mitsuba is a 1st year high school girl who is raised in a women-only family. She's the prodigy of her year, but rather than independence, she dreams of a happy family and a faithful husband. However, of all people, she ends up falling for the blonde boy with a bad reputation, Kubo Ryuunosuke...!

title.en: Jingai Hime-sama, Hajimemashita ~Free Life Fantasy Online~

altTitles.ja: 人外姫様、始めました 〜フリーライフファンタジーオンライン〜
人外姫様、始めました ～Ｆｒｅｅ　Ｌｉｆｅ　Ｆａｎｔａｓｙ　Ｏｎｌｉｎｅ～

altTitles.en: Free Life Fantasy Online: Immortal Princess

description.en:
Free Life Fantasy Online… a.k.a. FLFO.

Tsukishiro Kotone receives this game as gift from her little sister and starts playing. The character’s race she has selected was… one of “Inhuman” races for enthusiasts. A race said to be bad even among Inhuman races that are known to be difficult – a Zombie.  
  
Big Tiddies Onee-san playing Dark Soul VRMMO as Undead Princess.
description.ja:
金髪お嬢様・琴音の密かな趣味は、フルダイブ型ＶＲオンラインゲーム「Free Life Fantasy Online」だった！

リア充な日々から一転、ゲーム内では暗いカタコンベで、ゾンビになってソロプレイの日々を送っていた。だが探索中に、謎のレアアイテムを手に入れたことから、琴音は特殊進化を果たすのであった…！？

altTitles.en: I Picked It Up From Another World
I Picked a Mobile From Another World

altTitles.ja: 別の世界から拾ってきました

description.en:
In the midst of the devastation, only the soldiers’ bones remained.
It’s only a matter of time before the entire world is annihilated. To avoid this, Kyung-Hoon began searching for clues in another universe with the help of a ten-year-old phone he discovered in an abandoned building.

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8B%A4%EB%A5%B8-%EC%84%B8%EA%B3%84%EC%97%90%EC%84%9C-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9B%8C%EC%99%94%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2408)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/73500)
description.ja:
ある日、目が覚めるとなんと…見知らぬ廃虚にいた。 そこには無数の白骨化した死体に巨大なネズミ！？ なんとここは、滅亡した世界線の日本！ 元の世界がこうなるのも時間の問題…平行世界で手がかりを見つけ、滅亡を止めるんだ！

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8B%A4%EB%A5%B8-%EC%84%B8%EA%B3%84%EC%97%90%EC%84%9C-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9B%8C%EC%99%94%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2408)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/73500)
description.ko:
낯선 곳에서 눈을 떴다.
폐허가 된 주변, 뼈만 남겨진 군인의 시체.
이곳은 멸망한 서울!!!!
이대로 멸망한 세계처럼 되는 건 시간문제?!
다른 세계에서 단서를 찾아, 멸망을 막아야 한다.

***

킹메이커 작가님의 <다른 세계에서 주워왔습니다> 본격 웹툰화!

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8B%A4%EB%A5%B8-%EC%84%B8%EA%B3%84%EC%97%90%EC%84%9C-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9B%8C%EC%99%94%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2408)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/73500)
description.ru:
Я открыл глаза в незнакомом месте. Вокруг развалин были только тела и кости погибших солдат. Это разрушенный Сеул!!! Лишь вопрос времени, когда этот мир заменит мой. Я должен найти улики в параллельном мире и предотвратить его разрушение.

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8B%A4%EB%A5%B8-%EC%84%B8%EA%B3%84%EC%97%90%EC%84%9C-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9B%8C%EC%99%94%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2408)

title.en: Sousou no Frieren - kmtakpk's Frieren Koma (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 葬送のフリーレン - P助のフリーレンコマ

altTitles.en: Frieren at the Funeral - kmtakpk's Frieren Koma
Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End - kmtakpk's Frieren Koma

description.en: A collection of 1-5 koma manga shorts about *Frieren: Beyond Journey's End*.

altTitles.zh-hk: 公主大人，接下來是“拷問”時間

altTitles.zh: 公主大人，接下来是“拷问”时间

altTitles.ja: 姫様“拷問”の時間です

description.de:
Die illustre und militärisch begnadete Prinzessin des Königreiches wurde von Schergen des Dämonenfürsten gefangen genommen und in Ketten gelegt. Darauf bedacht, jede auch noch so kleine Information aus ihr herauszupressen, setzt der Dämonenfürst seine Großinquisitorin darauf an, die Prinzessin zum Reden zu bringen.  
  
Kann sie dieser schier endlosen Folter widerstehen? Oder knickt sie bei den Verhören ein und offenbart ihrem erbitterten Feind vitale Informationen über ihr geliebtes Königreich?  
  
Dies ist die Geschichte jener armen Prinzessin und der Qualen, die sie im Zuge der Verhöre erleiden muss.
description.en: The princess who's been held captive by the Demon Lord's army is scheduled to be executed by the Demon Lord's relentless torture!
description.id:
Seorang Putri yang ditahan oleh pasukan Raja Iblis, disiapkan untuk menerima siksaan dari Raja Iblis tanpa henti!  


---

**Links:**  
- [Chapter 1 art](https://i.imgur.com/SaOoznH.png)

description.en: First among the ten martial emperors, Peerless Martial Emperor Gu Fei Yang met his demise in the Tiandang mountains. He was reincarnated fifteen years later, as Li Yun Xiao of the Tianshui Nation, and thus began a heaven-defying battlefront with the countless talents of the current generation. Martial arts of the nine heavens and ten divine realms. From then on, the whole world was set ablaze.

altTitles.ja: メイドインアビス

description.en:
The enormous cave system, known as the Abyss, is the last unexplored place in the world. Nobody knows how deep down goes this titanic pit, inhabited by strange and wondrous creatures and full of mysterious ancient relics which purpose in unknown to modern man. Generations of bold adventurers have been drawn by the cryptic depths of the Abyss. In course of time those brave enough to explore the dangerous pit came to be known as "Delvers."  
  
In Orth, the town at the edge of the Abyss, there lives a little orphan named Riko, who dreams of becoming as great a delver as her mother was and solving the great mystery of the pit. One day, exploring the murky depths, she stumbles upon a little boy who turns out to be a robot…
description.ja:
隅々まで探索されつくした世界に、唯一残された秘境の大穴『アビス』。どこまで続くとも知れない深く巨大なその縦穴には、奇妙奇怪な生物たちが生息し、今の人類では作りえない貴重な遺物が眠っている。
「アビス」の不可思議に満ちた姿は人々を魅了し、冒険へと駆り立てた。そうして幾度も大穴に挑戦する冒険者たちは、次第に『探窟家』呼ばれるようになっていった。

アビスの縁に築かれた街『オース』に暮らす孤児のリコは、いつか母のような偉大な探窟家になり、アビスの謎を解き明かすことを夢見ていた。そんなある日、リコはアビスを探窟中に、少年の姿をしたロボットを拾い…？
description.ka: უზარმაზარი გამოქვაბულების სისტემა, რომელიც ცნობილია როგორც უფსკრული, არის ბოლო შეუსწავლელი ადგილი მსოფლიოში. არავინ იცის, რამდენად ღრმად მიდის ეს ტიტანური ორმო, დასახლებული უცნაური და გასაოცარი არსებებით და სავსე იდუმალი უძველესი რელიქვიებით, რომელთა დანიშნულება თანამედროვე ადამიანისთვის უცნობია. თამამი ავანტიურისტთა თაობები მიზიდული იქნა უფსკრულის იდუმალი სიღრმეებით. დროთა განმავლობაში მათ, ვინც საკმარისად გაბედულები გამოიკვლიეს სახიფათო ორმო, გახდნენ ცნობილი როგორც "დელვერები". ორთში, უფსკრულის პირას მდებარე ქალაქში, ცხოვრობს პატარა ობოლი, სახელად რიკო, რომელიც ოცნებობს გახდეს ისეთივე დიდი დელვერი, როგორც დედამისი იყო და ამოხსნას ორმოს დიდი საიდუმლო. ერთ დღეს, ბუნდოვანი სიღრმეების შესწავლისას, ის წააწყდება პატარა ბიჭს, რომელიც აღმოჩნდება, რომ რობოტია…
description.ru: Огромная пещерная система, известная как Бездна, является последним неисследованным местом в мире. В этой титанической яме обитают странные и удивительные существа. Она полна таинственных древних реликвий, предназначение которых неизвестно современному человеку. Поколения смелых авантюристов были затянуты загадочными глубинами Бездны. Со временем достаточно храбрые, чтобы исследовать опасную яму, стали известны как «Исследователи Бездны». В Оосу, городе на краю Бездны, живет маленькая сирота по имени Рико, которая мечтает стать великим пещерным налетчиком, каким была ее мать, и разгадать великую тайну ямы. Однажды, исследуя темные глубины, она натыкается на маленького мальчика, который оказывается роботом...
description.es-la: El enorme sistema de cuevas, conocido como El Abismo, es el último lugar inexplorado en el mundo. Nadie sabe que tan profundo es este agujero titánico, habitado por extrañas y maravillosas criaturas y lleno de misterio y reliquias antiguas de propósito desconocido para la humanidad. Generaciones de valientes aventureros han sido atraídos a las profundidades cripticas del Abismo. Con el paso del tiempo estos exploradores son conocidos como "Exploradores de las Profundidades". En Oath, el pueblo al borde del Abismo, vive una pequeña niña huérfana llamada Riko, que sueña con convertirse en una gran exploradora como su madre y descubrir los misterios del Abismo. Un día explorando las obscuras profundidades se encuentra con un niño, que resulta ser un robot...

altTitles.en: Precarious Female Executive Miss Black General
Precarious Woman Executive Miss Black General

altTitles.ja: 残念女幹部ブラックジェネラルさん

description.en: Braveman is your average superhero. Unfortunately for him, his arch-nemesis also happens to be a stalker and his number one fan. Follow their story as Braveman struggles to overcome his greatest adversary and retain his peace of mind.
description.pt-br: Braveman é um super herói como qualquer outro. Infelizmente pra ele, sua arqui-inimiga é sua stalker e sua fã número 1. Acompanhe as aventuras de Braveman e sua luta incansável contra seu maior adversário enquanto tenta não perder a cabeça.

title.en: Rules for Peddling in Another World

description.en: If you accidentally crossed over into another world, what kinds of abilities would you need to reach your peak in life? Would you became an Enchanter? A Hero? Or maybe a Cultivator of Immortal Techniques? Of course not. You would take advantage of your present day knowledge in this other world to do business and earn big bucks!

Yonghak ultimately failed to save the world despite repeated regressions. At the next regression, he decides to quit being a savior. But suddenly, disciples show up, one by one... Will the world be kept safe?! Will the savior be able to fulfill his bucket list of wishes for rest?!
description.ko:
반복되는 회귀에도 결국 세상을 구원하지 못한 용학 
다음 회귀에 이르러 구원자를 그만두기로 한다. 
그런데 하나둘 제자가 생기고… 세상이 자꾸만 구원되기 시작한다?! 
과연 구원자는 쉬고 싶어 하는 자신의 버킷리스트를 이룰 수 있을까?

altTitles.ja: 合鍵くんと幸せごはん

description.en: Nagisa, an office worker, ends up (almost) living together with Hiro, a long-distance driver. Food tastes even better than usual with “Aikagi-kun” and his big appetite. The casual time they spend together begins to color their days… A heartwarming story about a nearly thirty office worker and a younger man (almost) living together!
description.pt-br: Nagisa, uma funcionária de escritório, acaba (quase) morando junto com Hiro, um motorista de longa distância.  A comida tem um sabor ainda melhor do que o habitual com “Aikagi-kun” e seu grande apetite.  O tempo casual que passam juntos começa a colorir seus dias... Uma história comovente sobre um funcionário de escritório de quase trinta anos e um homem mais jovem (quase) vivendo juntos!

title.en: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Double Seven-hen

altTitles.ja-ro: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Daburu Sebun-hen

altTitles.en: The Irregular at Magic High School - Double Seven Arc

altTitles.ru: Непутёвый ученик в школе магии: Близняшки Саэгуса

altTitles.ja: 魔法科高校の劣等生 ダブルセブン編

altTitles.zh-hk: 魔法科高校的劣等生：雙七篇

altTitles.zh: 魔法科高校的劣等生：双七篇

altTitles.ja-ro: Mahō-ka Kōkō no Rettō-sei Double Seven-hen

description.en:
The second year has started! Mikihiko has been promoted to Course 1, Tatsuya has entered the new Magical Engineering Course, and trouble is brewing between Saegusa Mayumi's younger twin sisters and 1st year representative Shippou Takuma, a member of the 18 Assistant Houses' Shippou Household.  
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volume 12.

altTitles.ja: ドゥーム
DOOOOM―ドゥーム―

description.en: “Look and you’ll die.” “Post a message and you’ll be cursed.” Horror begins to spread with the use of smartphones. Introducing a new series filled with mystery about the horrors of social media!
description.es-la: "Mira y morirás". “Publica un mensaje y serás maldecido”. El horror comienza a extenderse con el uso de los teléfonos inteligentes. ¡Presentamos una nueva serie llena de misterio sobre los horrores de las redes sociales!

title.en: The Person Sitting Next to Me Looking at Me with Perverted Eyes

altTitles.ja: 隣の席の奴がエロい目で見てくる話

altTitles.vi: Người bàn bên thường nhìn tôi bằng ánh mắt biến thái

altTitles.ja-ro: Tonari no Seki no Yatsu ga Eroi me de Mitekuru Hanashi

description.en:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/117358783)

On the day Yun Li decided to give up on pursuing Fu Shize, she wiped off every possible trace of his contact information with teary eyes. A long time after they got together, Yun Li wasn't good at communication and was debating if she should block a guy friend who had expressed interest for her. Fu Shize leaned against the couch and stared at her with droopy eyes. He let out a chuckle before saying in a cold tone, "You're a piece of work."

Yun Li lifted her head. "?"

"Back then, you blocked me without hesitation."

"..."
description.zh: *轻度社恐（为爱做E版）x白月光（陨落版） *女追男 放弃追傅识则的那天，云厘红着眼睛，删掉了关于他的所有联系方式。 再后来，两人在一起后的某天。 云厘不擅长与人打交道，纠结了好一阵要不要删掉一个突然对她表露出暧昧倾向的男性朋友。 旁边的傅识则靠在沙发上，懒懒地看着她，突然笑了声，语气没什么温度：“可以。” 云厘抬头：“？” “删我微信就这么干脆。” “……”

altTitles.ja: 女魔王様はゆうしゃくんを倒せない。

description.en: Demon King Abyss was worried... about not being able to defeat the hero, considered the mortal enemy of the demons. This hero is still an inexperienced young man - he should be easy to defeat!.... However, the problem is that he, not knowing Abyss' true identity, considers her his "master" and becomes very fond of her...!

altTitles.ja: 拾われ子猫と元ヤクザ

altTitles.en: Ex-Yakuza Picked Up a Stray Kitten

description.en: A cat is picked up by a human on a rainy winter day. But unfortunately the anticipated savior is an ex-yakuza with a scary look.
description.ja: 雨の中、捨て猫のサブは一人の人間に拾われる。助かったと思ったものの、しかしその人間はどこからどう見てもヤのつく自由業な顔つきだった!?

altTitles.ja: カテナチオ

description.en: Yataro Araki, a member of the Tojo High School soccer team, has big dreams. Within a decade, he sees himself conquering the soccer world’s loftiest peak: European “football!” Fast forward to what may be his last soccer match before graduation, the match that will make or break his dreams. Having thus far failed to attract the attention of scouts, he is now desperate to do whatever it takes to prove himself. Yataro is prepared to get his hands dirty if it means winning. If it means standing at the top! Welcome to the world of international football! Nothing is sacred, no rule is left unbroken! Not when victory is on the line!
description.ja: 東條高校サッカー部に所属する嵐木八咫郎（あらきやたろう）の夢は欧州を制覇し、世界一になること。 高校3年の最後の試合、夢への第1歩、プロ入りを目指しスカウトの目に留まるため奮闘をするが―…。
description.vi: Yataro Araki là thành viên clb bóng đá trường cao trung Tojo. Cậu có ước mơ chinh phục đỉnh cao bóng đá Châu Âu trong 10 năm tới. Thời gian trôi qua, vào trận cuối cùng trước khi tốt nghiệp, và cũng là trận sẽ quyết định giấc mơ của cậu. Mọi thứ sẽ vô nghĩa nếu Araki không được tuyển trạch viên nào để ý đến, vì vậy cậu sẵn lòng làm tất cả mọi thứ, kể cả khi phải chơi bẩn để giành lấy chiến thắng. Nếu nó giúp cậu vươn đến đỉnh cao! Chào mừng đến với giới bóng đá quốc tế! Không tồn tại thứ gọi là bất khả xâm phạm hay luật lệ! Ít nhất là khi chiến thắng đang cận kề!

altTitles.ja: ケントゥリア

description.en: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!

title.en: Ochikobore Shoukanshi to Toumei na Boku

altTitles.ja-ro: Ochikobore Shoukanshi to Toumei na Boku

altTitles.ja: 落ちこぼれ召喚士と透明なぼく

altTitles.en: The Fallen Summoner and I, The Invisible One

altTitles.zh: 吊车尾召唤士与透明的我

description.en: The world is full of stories... novels, manga, movies, and anime. These stories that are thought to be fiction are a record of a world that actually exists as "another world". This is the story of a summoner who connects the world of stories and reality.

altTitles.vi: Các Hiệp sĩ trong khu Vực

altTitles.th: อัศวินในพื้นที่

altTitles.ja: エリアの騎士

description.en:
Aizawa Kakeru is an energetic and dedicated eighth grader who serves as the manager for his school’s football team. Though he was well known for being a talented player the previous year, an accident during one of his games caused Kakeru to vow never to play competitively again. Still passionate about the sport, Kakeru dreams of one day becoming a professional football trainer so that he can work alongside his older brother Suguru, the ace of the school team who has represented Japan in international competition.  
  
Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=13559) (anime).

Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

title.en: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED Astray R

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダムSEED ASTRAY R

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Senshi Gundam SEED: Astray R

description.en: Junk dealer Lowe Guele travels the universe with the Gundam Astray Red Frame he finds in the destroyed colony of Heliopolis!

altTitles.ja: おぼろとまち

description.en: From Miyagi to the bustling life of a Tokyo high school, Machi Nishina wanted anything but the ordinary. Her wish is granted in the most unexpected way when she encounters Oboro Kasumi, a classmate harboring a secret, who ends up following her home...?! A new era of friendship and youthful comedy unfolds!

altTitles.ja: マリッジグレー

altTitles.zh: 想不通可爱老婆为什么要与我结婚

altTitles.zh-ro: Xiǎng bùtōng kě'ài lǎopó wèishéme yào yǔ wǒ jiéhūn

description.en: My wife is suspicious!! Why did she marry a guy like me…? Ordinary average guy Tsuchioka Naotsugu ended up with Yoshino, who's perfect in all angles of beauty, know-how, and sociability. It's not "marriage blue" it's everyday life questioning over things, so it's "marriage gray" newlywed life, go!
description.ja: ウチのかわいすぎる妻は、なぜ超平凡な自分と結婚したのか――!?　自己評価激低な夫・槌岡直継は、妻・憙乃への疑念から“マリッジグレー”に陥っていた！　一方の憙乃は、日々溢れまくる直継へのLOVEを抑えるのに一生懸命で…!?　相思相愛な新婚夫婦の、激甘かけ違いラブコメディ！
description.pt-br: Minha esposa é muito suspeita! Eu não entendo por que ela se casou com alguém como eu? Por que uma mulher bonita, inteligente, e considerada como a Yoshino se casaria com alguém comum como Naotsugu!! Não há casamento azul aqui, apenas um suspeito caso de casamento cinza!!

altTitles.en: Studio Apartment, Good Lighting, Angel Included.

altTitles.ja: ワンルーム、日当たり普通、天使つき。

altTitles.zh: 單間, 光照尚好, 附帶天使

description.en:
What will happen when you wake up, and find a cute girl lying next to you in bed? Furthermore, she is not an ordinary girl, but an Angel who comes from Heaven???

Shintarou Tokamitsu is a high school boy living alone. One day, he found a beautiful girl sitting on his balcony. Her name is Towa, but what is her true identity? A romantic comedy between two innocent souls.
description.ja: 人暮らしの男子高校生、徳光森太郎。彼が自宅のベランダで出会ったのは清楚で優しい女の子『とわ』。けれど彼女の正体は…？　無垢な二人の胸キュン同居ラブコメディ♪
description.vi: Chúng ta đã quen với câu chuyện về anh nhân viên nhặt được bé JK tại lề đường. Nhưng sẽ ra sao nếu vẫn với chủ đề nhặt được người ấy, cậu học sinh năm nhất cao trung lại nhặt được một thiên thần từ Thiên Đàng ngay trong căn hộ của cậu ta? Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo??

altTitles.ja: ノーバディクライ

description.en: Nichika had a one-night-stand for the first time in her life. A life that consists of indifferent parents, friends who she can't shed her true feelings to ("because it's tedious"), and her belief that she's destined for Freeterdom. However, on a day when her dreams of that morning walk home have faded into reality, she once again meets the man she thought she would never see again…

A mysterious and unknown game journey.  
In the virtual game, experience the brilliance and darkness of human nature. When the player's game journey reaches the end, what is waiting for them …

altTitles.ja: ふたがしら

description.en:
Benzo and Soji witnessed the death of Tatsugoro, leader of the Akame Gang. His last words to them were "I'm leaving you two in charge", 
but it was Jinzaburo, the former leader's friend, who was chosen instead. Displeased with the widow's decision, the two left the gang. 
They then set off on an aimless journey, vowing to accomplish something big.  
  
Spin-off of [Saraiya Goyou](https://mangadex.org/manga/24096) featuring Souji the Saint and Benzou the Demon as young men.

altTitles.ja: いとしのニーナ

description.en: One afternoon, Atsushi's best friend from childhood, Masa, informs him, "I kidnapped Niina Aota." Niina, whose popular nickname is "Nina", is the girl Masa fell in love with at first sight on the train attending school. Atsushi found it unexpected and hard to believe, until he heads over to Masa's apartment and discovers that Nina has really been kidnapped….

The dragon girl met her dragon hunter when her hometown was consumed by flames. The hunter protected her by forming the Partner Alliance-a sacred contract bonding the destined two together-and dragged her out of the sea of fire. Together, they set out seeking revenge. Little did they know that…by taming her, he was also tamed by her.

altTitles.ja: 負けヒロインが多すぎる！@comic

altTitles.vi: Có Quá Nhiều Nữ Chính Thua Cuộc! @comic

description.en:
***“Huh? Who are you calling losing?”***

As the background of the class, I, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, witnessed a popular girl–Anna Yanami, getting rejected by another guy.

_“Even though he said we’ll get married. Don’t you think he’s pretty mean?”
“When did he say that?”
“When we were 4 or 5 years old.”_

That doesn’t count, right? With this, the losing heroines like Remon Yakishio from the Track and Field Club, and Chika Komari, from the literature club.

_“Nukumizu-kun. There are two types of girls. Childhood friends or cheating cats.”
“I see. Well, that’s a bold statement.”_

There’s a fortune for those who shine only after losing. Losing Heroines—The curtain to the mysterious coming-of-age story “Makeine” opens now!
  
---

**Links:**  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/books/09453017)
- [Alternative Raw](https://shogakukan-comic.jp/book-series?cd=51545)
description.ja:
クラスの背景モブ高校生こと温水和彦は、男子に人気のクラスメート・八奈見杏菜が幼馴染にフラれるのを目撃してしまう。
仕方なく八奈見を慰める温水だが、それをきっかけに、様々な負け感あふれる女子たちに絡まれることになり――!?
負けヒロイン――マケインたちと辿る謎の青春が、ここに幕を開ける！
負けてこそ輝く彼女たちに、幸いあれ。
description.vi:
“Hử? Cậu gọi ai là đồ thua cuộc cơ?”

Tôi, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, một nhân vật làm nền trong lớp, chứng kiến cảnh cô nàng nổi tiếng – Anna Yanami bị một nam sinh khác từ chối.

“Dù cho cậu ấy đã từng nói bọn mình sẽ kết hôn đấy. Cậu có thấy cậu ấy quá đáng không?”

“Cậu ấy nói thế vào lúc nào vậy?”

“Hồi bọn tớ 4 hay 5 tuổi gì đó.”

Thế thì đâu có tính?

Cùng với cô nàng còn có những nữ chính thua cuộc khác như Remon Yakishio của Câu lạc bộ Điền kinh và Komari Chika từ Câu lạc bộ Văn học.

“Nukumizu-kun nè, trên đời có hai loại con gái. Một là bạn thuở nhỏ, còn lại là đồ đàn bà giựt bồ.”

“Vậy hả. Chà, một tuyên bố đầy táo bạo ha.”

Có một loại vận mệnh rằng có những người chỉ thực sự toả sáng sau khi đã thua cuộc.

Những nữ chính thua cuộc—Bức màn câu chuyện tuổi mới lớn mang tên “Makein” sẽ lật mở ngay bây giờ!
description.es-la: "¿Eh? ¿A quién llamas perdedor?" Como fondo de la clase, yo, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, fui testigo de cómo una chica popular -Anna Yanami- era rechazada por otro chico. "Aunque dijo que nos casaríamos. ¿No crees que es bastante malo?" "¿Cuándo dijo eso?" "Cuando teníamos 4 o 5 años". Eso no cuenta, ¿verdad? Con esto, las heroínas perdedoras como Remon Yakishio del Club de Atletismo, y Chika Komari, del club de literatura. "Nukumizu-kun. Hay dos tipos de chicas. Las amigas de la infancia o las gatas tramposas". "Ya veo. Bueno, esa es una declaración audaz". Hay una fortuna para los que brillan sólo después de perder. ¡Heroínas perdedoras-El telón de la misteriosa historia de madurez "Makeine" se abre ahora! ["Makeine" es la abreviación del nombre del manga]

altTitles.ja: 風の戦士ダン

description.en: The Kyosha and Jinma clans are ninja organizations living in the modern age. They were called "super ninja," or "super shinobi." However, these two clans have been fighting a fierce battle to exterminate each other. Why? The unique tag team of Tetsu Kariya and Kazuhiko Shimamoto unleash a painful work!

altTitles.ja: アイドル×アイドル　ストーリー！

description.en:
Mimi Nagisa (22 years old) is a former idol. After giving up on her dream of being an idol because of her lacking talent she spends her days working part-time while attending college. However, the moment she meets the idol Ibuki Nanakusa, whom she recently found interest in, their lives begin to cross each other.

(Source: Comic Fuz, translated)

[Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/idol2story_info)
description.ja: 才能がないと夢を諦めた元アイドルのミミと、ミミに憧れていた現役アイドル・イブキ。そんな2人が、ひょんな出会いから一緒にサバイバルオーディション番組への出演を目指すことに…!?　一度は諦めかけた夢、今度こそ2人でなら…！
description.ru: Мими Нагиса (22 года) — бывший айдол. После того, как она отказалась от своей мечты стать айдолом из-за отсутствия таланта, она проводит дни работая на неполный рабочий день, учась в колледже. Однако в тот момент, когда она встречает кумира Ибуки Нанакуса, к которому она недавно проявляла интерес, их жизни начинают пересекаться.

description.en: They were childhood friends, and she had always been more powerful than him. But when they accidentally traveled (summoned?) to another world, it was finally time for him to become the knight in shining armor! He had to find her first though, since they were separated… Come and witness his fight to be better in a crazy world where monsters roamed and technology was so advanced your amputated limbs could be restored to perfection…

altTitles.ja: 猫が如く

description.en:
The Yakuza boss is... a cat!? The "brown tiger" group boss, Oyaji. Yanagi, the new recruit in the Yakuza, and the gang members are once again at the mercy of the carefree Oyaji today... But it's not that bad.
A lively comedy about a cat... Begins!!

The title Like a Cat, or Neko ga Gotoku, is a parody of the Yakuza game series' title which is Like a Dragon or Ryu ga Gotoku.

title.en: A Cool Older Lady That Makes Me Crazy

altTitles.ja: 僕を狂わすカッコイイお姉さん

altTitles.en: A Cool Older Lady Who Drives Me Crazy

title.en: Kusuriya no Hitorigoto ~Maomao no Koukyuu Nazotoki Techou~

altTitles.en: The Apothecary Diaries: Maomao's Rear Palace Mysteries Journal
The Apothecary Diaries: Maomao's Rear Palace Notebook of Mysteries

altTitles.ru: Монолог в аптечной лавке - Журнал тайн внутреннего дворца Маомао

altTitles.ja: 薬屋のひとりごと～猫猫の後宮謎解き手帳～

description.en:
In the imperial court, a young woman is put into servitude, Maomao. The tale is just beginning for the woman doctor/pharmacist from the red-light district, as rumors circulate about the emperor's children's lives being short-lived. Her curious nature and thirst for knowledge pushes her to action. To satisfy her curiosity, this young doctor/pharmacist will investigate the origin! What is shifting in the imperial court..!?  
  


---
description.ja: 誘拐された挙句、とある大国の後宮に売り飛ばされた薬屋の少女・猫猫（マオマオ）。年季が明けるまで大人しくしようと決めていた猫猫だったが、あるとき皇帝の子どもたちが次々と不審死することを知る。好奇心と少しばかりの正義心、そして薬屋の知識を使い、その謎を調べ始めてから猫猫の運命は大きく変わって…？
description.ru: В императорский двор была доставлена молодая девушка Маомао. История её берёт начало в районе красных фонарей, где начали ходить слухи о том, что жизни детей императора под угрозой. Ею движут любопытство и жажда знаний. Чтобы удовлетворить своё любопытство, молодая целительница будет докапываться до истины! Что же изменится при императорском дворе?!

title.en: Company and Private Life -On and Off-

altTitles.ja: 会社と私生活－オンとオフ－

altTitles.es-la: Vida Empresarial y Privada - ON y OFF -

description.en:
Working people have company (on) and private lives (off). Some are office workers and Lolita in women's clothing. Others are office workers and punks dressed as men.

The gap between on and off life is a must-see! A daily tale of two working people's metamorphosis!

---

A serialization of the [Twitter series](https://mangadex.org/title/0fa5d834-fdab-4ac4-b3c9-821f1580f991/company-and-private-life) about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.
description.ja:
働く二人の大変身（メタモルフォーゼ）日常譚！
働く人々には会社（オン）と私生活（オフ）がある。ある人は会社員と女装ロリィタ。ある人は会社員と男装パンク。オンとオフのギャップにキュン必至！ 働く二人の大変身（メタモルフォーゼ）日常譚！X（旧:Twitter）にて累計200万いいね突破の話題作が、イラストから完全コマ割りでコミックス化！
description.es-la: Estos trabajadores tienen una vida en la empresa (ON) y otra privada (OFF). El es un oficinista que se viste de Lolita. Ella es una oficinistas que se viste de punk.

altTitles.ja: バーテンダー

description.en:
Genius bartender Ryu Sasakura makes the most incredible cocktails anyone has ever tasted. Seeking his "Glass of God", individuals from all different walks of life visit his bar. 
With both a compassionate ear and a godly drink, Ryu helps people with their problems.  
  
Volume Subtitles:  
1: **Gentle Perch** (優しい止まり木, Yasashī Tomariki)
2: **Perfect Taste** (完璧な味, Kanpekina Aji)
3: **Bar Face** (バーの顔, Bā no Kao)
4: **A Cup for the Traveler** (旅人のための一杯, Tabibito no Tame no Ippai)
5: **One for the Road** 
6: **Cigar Smoke** (葉巻の煙, Hamaki no Kemuri) 
7: **Martini's Face** (マティーニの顔, Matīni no Kao)
8: **Eden Hall Good Luck** (イーデンホールの幸運, Īdenhōru no Kōun)  
9: **First "Customer"** (最初の『客』, Saisho no “Kyaku”)
10: **It Won't Sink** (たゆたえども沈まず, Tayutaedomo Shizumazu)
11: **Each Turning Point** (それぞれの転機, Sorezore no Tenki)  
12: **Cross Road** (クロス・ロード, Kurosu Rōdo) 
13: **The Kindness of Failure** (失敗の優しさ, Shippai no Yasashi-sa)
14: **Serving Cup** (献杯, Kenpai) 
15: **Past** (過去, Kako)  
16: **Rita Takazuru's Story** (竹鶴・リタの物語, Takedzuru Rita no Monogatari)  
17: **Door to Tomorrow** (明日への扉, Asuhenotobira)  
18: **Bar Treasures** (バーの宝物, Bā no Takaramono) 
19: **Departure** (旅立ち, Tabidachi)  
20: **Good Man** (善い人, Yoi Hito, ALT. ENG. - Good Person)  
21: **The Teachings of Goodbye** (サヨナラの教え, Sayonara no Oshie)
  
Links:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=6816)

altTitles.ja: 三咲くんは攻略キャラじゃない

description.en: In this gal game world. The mission of the best friend character, Izumi Misaki, is supposed to be to support the protagonist, Hareta Kihara, in romancing the heroine... but for some reason, the crucial Kihara is planning to capture Misaki's heart instead!? "Become the heroine while remaining a boy!" Friendship? Romance? A heart-pounding comedy about a femboy!
description.ja: ここはギャルゲーの世界。 親友キャラ・三咲泉の使命は、主人公・季原晴太のヒロイン攻略のサポート…のはずが、 肝心の季原は何故か三咲を攻略するつもりで――!? 「男の子のままヒロインになってくれ！」 友情？愛情？男の娘ハッピー胸キュンコメディ!!

altTitles.ja: アズールレーン４コママンガ　びそくぜんしんっ！

description.en: Official 4-koma webcomic from the popular mobile game Azur Lane.

title.en: My Sect's Senior Disciple Has a Hole in His Brain

altTitles.en: There's a Pit in My Senior's Brain
There's Something Wrong with My Da Shixiong's Brain

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Jia Da Shi Xiong Nao Zi You Keng

description.en:
The hilarious adventures of the eldest disciple of a sect who has a problem with his brain. Dong Fang Xian Yun was reincarnated as the most senior disciple of the Carefree sect. But the only thing that goes through his mind is to make sure he doesn't end up dying by the hands of the "main character". Read as he makes no sense to his fellow disciples while avoiding flags left and right.  
  
*Note : Although there are many chapters listed as missing, nothing is actually missing, some of chapter combining into one.*

title.en: The Invincible Summoner Who Crawled Up from Level 1

altTitles.ja: レベル1から始まる召喚無双~俺だけ使える裏ダンジョンで、全ての転生者をぶっちぎる

altTitles.ja-ro: Level 1 kara Hajimaru Shoukan Musou: Ore dake Tsukaeru Ura Dungeon de, Subete no Tenseisha o Bucchigiru

altTitles.en: Summon Warriors: Hack n’ Slash Starting from Level 1

description.en:
Shinobu Iijima lost his life along with his beloved sister and prickly stepfather in a mysterious disaster.
When he woke up, he was reborn in the world of the game he had been playing.
Shinobu was in despair as his stepfather erased his game data and he had to start from the tutorial, but he learned that his sister would soon be reincarnated into this world as well.
In order to stop his father-in-law, a top player who was after his sister's body, he embarks on a painful path to become the strongest...!
description.id:
Shinobu Iijima kehilangan nyawanya bersama adik perempuan,
 Ketika dia bangun, dia sudah bereinkarnasi di dunia game yang dia mainkan.
 Shinobu putus asa untuk memulai permainan dari awal setelah ayah angkatnya menghapus data gamenya, tetapi dia mengetahui bahwa adik perempuannya akan segera bereinkarnasi di dunia ini juga.
 Untuk menghentikan ayah angkatnya menjadi pemain top yang mengincar tubuh adik perempuannya, dia akan memulai jalan menuju yang paling menyakitkan ...!

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

altTitles.th: นักเรียนพี่เลี้ยงเด็ก

altTitles.ja: 学園ベビーシッターズ

description.en: After their parents are killed in a plane crash, Ryuuichi and his younger brother Kotarou are taken in by the chairman, who they never met before, of an elite academy. Ryuuichi becomes the school daycare's new babysitter.
description.pt: Após perderem os pais em um acidente de avião os irmãos Kotarou e Ryuuichi são mandados para o colégio Morinomiya, lá eles precisam trabalhar na creche para poder manter sua estadia.
description.pt-br: Após perderem os pais em um acidente de avião os irmãos Kotarou e Ryuuichi são mandados para o colégio Morinomiya, lá eles precisam trabalhar na creche para poder manter sua estadia.

title.en: Rascal Does Not Dream of a Dreaming Girl

altTitles.ja: 青春ブタ野郎はゆめみる少女の夢を見ない

altTitles.ru: Этот глупый свин не понимает мечту девочки-мечтательницы

altTitles.ja-ro: Seishun Buta Yarou wa Yumemiru Shoujo no Yume wo Minai

description.en:
The Shouko arc of "Rascal" series, Dengeki Bunko's popular works, serialized as manga!

Just before summer vacation starts, Makinohara Shouko, a middle school second year student, met a high school student named Azusagawa Sakuta. Sakuta gave Shouko a desire to live, then...
Experience the love story, with Shouko as the main character, in a way only possible through manga.

*From ComicWalker, translated*

title.en: I Tamed a Tyrant and Ran Away

altTitles.de: Ich zähmte den Tyrannen und rannte weg

altTitles.fr: Fuir le tyran que j'ai crée
J'ai apprivoisé un tyran et me suis enfuie

altTitles.pt: Eu domei um tirano e escapei

altTitles.fa: یک ستمگر رو رام کردم و بعدش فرار کردم

altTitles.ja: 暴君を手懐けて逃げてしまった

altTitles.zh-hk: 我在馴服暴君後落跑了

altTitles.th: ฉันลวงทรราชให้ภักดีแล้วหนีจาก

altTitles.vi: Thuần Hóa Bạo Chúa Rồi Bỏ Trốn

description.en:
God gave me a chance to relive my life. Before my rebirth, I'd been used for the past 400 years as the empire's sword. And so, I swore to destroy the empire. I found the young prince of the country and became his teacher. I taught him how to become a tyrant and asked for the country.

"I will do as the lady wishes."

He conquered the whole empire for me, and I ran away.

"I came to take you, Charlize Ronan," Dylan had become a perfect tyrant and searched the entire empire for me.

"You tamed me, so why did you run away?"

---
All Charlize Ronan ever wanted was to bring honor to her family. But instead, she is forced into becoming a “living sword” -- a mere tool for the emperors. It is from this hell that she prays for justice… and awakens in her former body. Now, determined to tear down this horrible empire, Charlize seeks out the young prince, Dylan Blade. She will put him on the throne, not as an honorable ruler, but as a tyrant. It is time for Charlize to tame the one who will bring forth her revenge.

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/52478267), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=6005645)

description.es:
Dios me dio la oportunidad de revivir mi vida. Antes de mi renacimiento, me habían utilizado durante los últimos 400 años como espada del imperio. Y así, juré destruir el imperio. Encontré al joven príncipe del país y me convertí en su maestra. Le enseñé a convertirse en un tirano y le pregunté por el país.

"Haré lo que la dama desee."

Conquistó todo el imperio para mí y me escapé.

"Vine a llevarte, Charlize Ronan." Dylan se había convertido en un perfecto tirano y me buscó por todo el imperio.

"Me domaste, así que ¿por qué te escapaste?"

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/52478267), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=6005645)

description.ru:
Бог дал мне еще один шанс и наконец я вернулась спустя четыреста лет. Как только я поняла, что вернулась, я решила, что «Никто не должен быть охвачен гордыней». Моей целью было уничтожить страну. Итак, я выросла с гениальным принцем, который жил в подполье и ожидал возможности для возвращения. Он захватил Империю для меня, и я оставила его, чтобы он достиг своей цели.
— Я пришел, чтобы забрать тебя, Шарлиз Ронан.
Через несколько лет поисков по всему континенту Дилан, ставший идеальным тираном, нашел меня.
— Почему ты сбежала?!

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/52478267), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=6005645)

description.uk:
Кейра – меч імператорів, що несе славу та розквіт Імперії Блейд. Ніхто й подумати не може, що колись цей меч був людиною. 
Шарліз Ронан лише хотіла стати честю своєї сім'ї. Погодившись стати імперським лицарем, вона не знала, на які страждання себе прирекла. Хоч її тіло перетворили на меч, та розум завжди був у свідомості. З самого пекла вона молилася про справедливість.

«Я не проклятий меч! Я – людина!»

Їй дали другий шанс. Шанс на помсту. Шарліз рішуче вирішила знищити Імперію Блейд. Вона посадить на трон Ділана, тринадцятого принца, не як почесного правителя, а як жорсткого тирана. Вона зруйнує імперію навіть ціною власного життя.

«Шарліз, чому ти спочатку підкорила мене, а потім залишила?»

---
